pageProduct.name: Swisse Ultivite Men's Multivitamin + Superfood Blend 7 pack
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Swisse Ultivite Men's Multivitamin + Superfood Blend Sachets Natural Berry contains key nutrients to support energy production and vitality. Great tasting with the added goodness of superfoods.

Swisse Ultivite Women's Multivitamin + Superfood Blend is a comprehensive multi-nutrient powder bursting with important vitamins, minerals and antioxidants to help you stay healthy and energised. Specifically tailored for men, this daily wellness blend nourishes the body from the inside out, filling nutritional gaps and supporting energy production and stamina.

- Vitamins, Minerals & Herbals Blend: Combination of blended nutritional and botanical ingredients carefully selected for men.

- Superfoods: Contains a blend of antioxidant-rich superfoods including acerola cherry fruit juice powder from Brazil, plus matcha green tea leaf powder from the Yuhang region in China. 

- Fills Nutritional Gaps: This specialised nutrient blend can help prevent dietary nutritional deficiencies when dietary intake is inadequate, to help enhance and promote general health and wellbeing. 

- Supports Energy Production: Contains B vitamins, which support energy production, stamina and vitality. 

- Powdered Format: Convenient single-dose sachets offer a great-tasting alternative for those who have difficulty in swallowing tablets or capsules. 

- Based on scientific evidence. 
- Premium Quality Formula. 
- Peanut-free. 
- Gluten-free. 
- Soy-free.
- No added lactose, egg, artificial colours or flavours.

Suitable For: Men

Product Claims: Peanut-free, Soy-free, Gluten-free. No added lactose, egg, yeast, artificial colours or flavours.

Size: 7g 7 Pack

Flavour: Natural Berry

Serving Suggestion: Try our multivitamin blend in:
- Water.
- Smoothies or shakes.
- Nut or dairy milk.
- Non-acidic juices.

Warnings

When taken in excess of 3000mcg/RE, vitamin A can cause birth defects. If you are pregnant, or considering becoming pregnant, do not take vitamin A supplements without consulting your doctor or pharmacist.

The recommended daily amount of vitamin A from all sources is 700 mcg/RE for women and 900mcg/RE for men. This product contains selenium which is toxic in high doses. A daily dose of 150mcg for adults of selenium from dietary supplements should not be exceeded. Do not take while on warfarin therapy without medical advice. Not for the treatment of iron deficiency conditions. Vitamins & mineral supplements should not replace a balanced diet. If symptoms persist, talk to your health professional. Do not use if sachet is torn or carton seal is broken.

IMPORTANT INFORMATION

Swisse is a carbon neutral company.
This cardboard box is made from 100% recycled board. It is both biodegradable and compostable. It can be disposed of in domestic composting systems, or through local green waste programs. Please dispose of sachets in the rubbish bin.

Ingredients

EACH SACHET (7 g) CONTAINS: Vitamin A (retinol acetate) 700mcg/RE: Vitamin B1 (thiamine from thiamine hydrochloride) 10mg; Vitamin B2 (riboflavin) 10mg; Nicotinamide 10mg; Vitamin B5 (pantothenic acid from calcium pantothenate) 20mg; Vitamin B6 (pyridoxine from pyridoxine hydrochloride) 10mg; Vitamin B12 (cyanocobalamin) 30.10mcg; Biotin 49.70mcg; Vitamin C (ascorbic acid from calcium ascorbate dihydrate) 165mg; Vitamin D3 (cholecalciferol) 200IU; Vitamin E (d-alpha-tocopheryl acid succinate) 50IU; Folic acid 300.30mcg; Calcium (from calcium hydrogen phosphate dehydrate) 100mg; Choline (from choline bitartrate) 11.13mg; Chromium (from chromic chloride hexahydrate) 9.03mcg; Copper (from cupric sulfate pentahydrate) 400mcg; Iodine (from potassium iodide) 50mcg; Iron (from ferrous fumarate) 3mg; Magnesium (from heavy magnesium oxide) 120mg; Manganese (from manganese sulfate monohydrate) 1.40mg; Potassium (from potassium citrate) 4mg; Selenium (from selenomethionine) 28mcg; Zinc (from zinc sulfate monohydrate) 6mg; Acacia 100mg; Co-enzyme Q10 (ubidecarenone) 1mg; Inositol 25mg; Lutein 200mcg; Lysine (from lysine hydrochloride) 40mg; Tyrosine 1mg; Acai (Euterpe oleracea extract 12.53mg) Equiv. fresh fruit 100mg; Acerola (Malpighia glabra juice powder 18.20mg) Equiv. fresh fruit juice 200mg (standardised to contain ascorbic acid 3.10mg); Broccoli (Brassica oleracea var. Italica powder 157 92mg) Equiv. fresh sprout 3g; Ginger (Zingiber officinale extract 249.90mcg) Equiv. dry rhizome 5mg; Green tea (Camellia sinensis leaf powder) 50mg; Himalayan goji (Lyceum barbarum extract 2 50mg) Equiv. dry fruit 50mg; Kale (Brassica oleracea var. viridis leaf powder) 750mg; Korean ginseng (Panax ginseng extract 5mg) Equiv. dry root 50mg; Maca (Lepidium meyenii extract 2.49mg) Equiv. dry tuber 25 mg Milk thistle (Silybum marianum extract 714mcg) Equiv. dry fruit 50mg; Papaya (Carica papaya dry fruit powder) 50mg; Pomegranate (Punica granatum extract 16mg) Equiv dry seed 80mg; Spinach (Spinacia oleracea juice powder 110mg) Equiv. fresh juice herb 550mg.

Contains: Selenium. Phenylalanine, Sucralose & Sulfites.

Allergen Contains: Artificial Sweeteners| Phenylalanine| Sulphites

Allergen Free From: Artificial Colours| Artificial Flavours| Egg| Gluten| Lactose| Peanuts| Soy| Yeast

Directions

Tear, blend, enjoy.

Take once daily, during or immediately after a meal or as directed by a healthcare professional.

PREPARATION INSTRUCTIONS

Mix 1 sachet (7g) with 250mL of water, or add to non-acidic juices, milk of your choice or smoothies & shakes.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 25°C in a cool, dry place.
